Menkeu Lantik Dirjen Pajak Baru, "Tugasnya Sangat Berat"
01 Nov 2019, 11:09 by Magdalena


Menkeu Lantik Dirjen Pajak Baru, "Tugasnya Sangat Berat"

Â KBRN, Jakarta: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati melantik dirjen pajak yang baru Suryo Utomo, menggantikan Dirjen Pajak sebelumnya Robert Pakpahan yang sudah memasuki masa pensiun.Pelantikan Suryo Utomo hari ini, mengakhiri spekulasi yang beredar beberapa hari belakangan ini, terkait siapakah yang akan terpilih sebagai dirjen pajak yang baru , yang dipilih oleh Presiden Joko Widodo.Posisi dirjen pajak merupakan posisi yang strategis, karena tugasnya mengawal pendapatan negara dari sektor perpajalan. Karenanya dalam pesannya hari ini, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani mengatakan bahwa dirjen pajak memiliki tanggung jawab yang sangat berat."Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dirjen Pajak sangat berat, karena 70 persen penerimaan dalam APBN kita yang berasal dari penerimaan pajak, digunakan untuk mendukung seluruh aktivitas republik ini," tukas Menkeu Sri Mulyani dalam pelantikan yang berlangsung di aula Mezzanine Kementerian Keuangan Jakarta, Jumat ( 01/11/2019).Suryo Utomo, kelahiran Semarang tanggal 26 Maret 1969, adalah pejabat karir di Ditjen Pajak. Dirjen Pajak yang baru ini mengenyam pendidikan sebagai sarjana ekonomi di Universitas Diponegoro / meraih gelar Master of Business Taxation di University Southern of California / dan mendapat gelar Doctor of Philosophy in Taxation di University Kebangsaan Malaysia. Jabatan terakhirnya sebelum terpilih sebagai Dirjen Pajak adalah Staf Ahli Menteri Keuangan bidang Kepatuhan Pajak.Bersamaan dengan pelantikan dirjen pajak hari ini, Menkeu Sri Mulyani juga melantik 17 pejabat Kemenkeu lainnya, yaitu 10 pejabat di lingkungan Direktorat Jenderal Bea dan Cukai, 4 orang pejabata Lembaga Nasional Single Window dan 2 orang direksi LPDP. Ia berpesan agar seluruh pejabatnya melaksanakan tugas dengan sebaik-baiknya.

Minister of Finance Inaugurates New Director General of Tax, "The Duty Is Very Heavy"
Nov 1 2019, 11:09 by Magdalena


Minister of Finance Inaugurates New Director General of Tax, "The Duty Is Very Heavy"

KBRN, Jakarta: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati inaugurates the new director general of tax Suryo Utomo, replacing the previous Director General of Tax Robert Pakpahan who has entered retirement. Suryo Utomo's inauguration today, ending speculation circulating in recent days, regarding who will be elected as the new director general of taxes, chosen by President Joko Widodo.The position of the director general of taxation is a strategic position, because his job is to oversee state revenues from the transportation sector. Therefore in his message today, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani said that the Director General of Taxes has a very heavy responsibility. "The duties and responsibilities of the Director General of Taxes are very heavy, because 70 percent of revenues in our APBN derived from tax revenues, are used to support all republican activities this, "said Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani in the inauguration which took place in the Mezzanine hall of the Ministry of Finance Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019) .uryo Utomo, born in Semarang on March 26, 1969, was a career official at the Tax Directorate General. The new Director General of Taxation received his education as an economics graduate at Diponegoro University / earned a Master of Business Taxation at the University of Southern of California / and earned a Doctor of Philosophy in Taxation at the Malaysian National University. His last position before being elected as Director General of Tax was the Expert Staff of the Minister of Finance in Tax Compliance. Along with the inauguration of the tax director general today, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani also installed 17 other Ministry of Finance officials, namely 10 officials within the Directorate General of Customs and Excise, 4 officials of the National Institution Single Window and 2 LPDP directors. He advised all officials to carry out their duties properly.
